definition: a rectangular groove made to hold two pieces together, join with a rebate
details:
noun
- a rectangular groove made to hold two pieces together
= synonyms: rabbet
- a refund of some fraction of the amount paid
= synonyms: discount
verb
- join with a rebate
= example: join with a rebate
- cut a rebate in (timber or stone)
- give a reduction in the price during a sale
